short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View the carbon impact of various products and make a more informed buying decision on Amazon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple way to reduce your carbon impact while buying products on Amazon. Power by swrm (www.greanswrm.com).

How it works:
While shopping on Amazon, Footprint will provide the carbon impact of the product you are viewing. Click on the carbon impact and see other similar products that have a lower carbon impact.

If suggested similar prodcuts don't match the product you want to buy, let us know and we'll update Footprint to provide better suggestions with your feedback.

Footprint covers many but not all products. We have worked to cover the most popular products categories on Amazon and continue to add product coverage based on user feedback.

www.fp.eco
